description: This API let you create unique meetingId.

postParameters.description: You can take advantage of regional API to decrease latency in video calling. `sg001` for Singapore, SG. `sg002` another for Singapore, SG. `in001` for Bangalore, IN. `eu001` for Frankfurt, DE. `us001` for Fremont, CA. Default region: `sg001`.
Customize Room id for better understanding.
